sub_title: "Storyteller and Impact Creator: Award-Winning Filmmaker and Photographer Brings Human and Social Issues to Life through Documentary Film, Exhibitions and Campaigns."
summary:
Daimon Xanthopoulos is a Dutch born photographer, filmmaker, and creative leader, born in 1979. He started his photography career in 2000 after studying at the Royal Academy of Art in The Hague. His focus has always been on human and social issues, reflected in his self-initiated projects and documentaries. Daimon's work has been recognized with international awards, shown in exhibitions and cultural festivals worldwide, as well as published in international newspapers, magazines, and campaigns. In addition to his photography, he consults and leads creativity for international brands to define their company stories and create impactful campaigns. Daimon also gives lectures, masterclasses, and workshops across the world.

In addition to photography, Daimon has worked on film productions as a cinematographer and director, creating impactful award-winning documentaries and storytelling videos. He believes in the power of stories and wants to create the best impact with the right medium, using both photography and film. With his co-founder Stefan Osadzinski, he founded SALIENT FILM, a company specializing in creating impactful independent documentaries and sincere storytelling videos. Their work transcends language barriers and evokes emotion to inspire action, connecting with audiences and leaving a lasting impression.

awards.title: Roots of Evil
awards.description: Nominated for the best online documentary 'Begin van het Kwaad’ or Roots of Evil. Published with VPRO radio, Trouw newspaper and VPRO gids. Web-documentary is about a journey inspired by the book of Graham Green (journey without maps) showing the stories and magical world of the secret societies in west Africa and exploring their role during the civil wars.

awards.description: Zilveren Camera, 2nd place media-innovation award with the story ‘Detroit, stories from a city in free fall’ Th price was given because of the combination of photography and sound that made a small web multimedia work.

awards.title: "Detroit, stories from a city in free fall"
awards.description: We received the special price in the Prix Italia 2009 for the web-radio documentary "Detroit, stories from a city in free fall" It was a documentary made from audio combined with photography and focused on the people and situation of Detroit.

profile_positions.description: SALIENT FILM is founded by experienced photographer and filmmaker Daimon Xanthopoulos and music composer Stefan Osadzinski, specializes in creating impactful award winning independent documentary films and sincere storytelling videos for a global clientele. From short online series to commercials and fundraising campaigns, we bring a human touch to our visuals, transcending language barriers and touching hearts to evoke emotion and inspire action. With complete in-house facilities, we bring stories to life, connecting with audiences and leaving a lasting impression.
profile_positions.title: Director and Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: A photographer with international expertise in documenting social issues and news for various media outlets, including newspapers, magazines, and cross-media and multimedia web-specials. Award-winning and recognized for his documentary work, including 2022 De TEGEL Storimans prize, 2021 Chelsea International Art award, winner of the Prix Italia special impact prize and multiple nominations and honors at international photography festivals and awards. The photographic series and renowned portfolio has been showcased in various international cultural events and exhibitions, including the Noorderlicht photo festival, Naarden festival, photofestival Perpignan France, Athens photo festival, Tbilisi photo festival, Chicago Artfair and countless others, exhibiting his work across the world.
profile_positions.title: Professional Photographer

profile_positions.description: The Panasonic LUMIX Ambassador program is designed to inspire avid photographers and videographers to benefit from all the functions and features of Panasonic’s LUMIX range of cameras. They will host lectures and workshops and showcase their latest works through different channels.
profile_positions.title: Global Brand Ambassador

profile_positions.description: Lumix Stories is a global English and german written photography magazine with inspirational articles and portfolios of photographers specially created and printed for Panasonic. The English magazine can be found across fairs, events or through the Panasonic channels.
profile_positions.title: Chief editor, Publisher of LUMIX Stories Magazine

profile_positions.description: I have been working as a photographer on stories for National Geographic magazine. A publication about a hospice in the Netherlands, a story on Faith in Europe, a project on holy trees, an assignment about young war veterans living with PTSD.
profile_positions.title: documentary photographer

profile_positions.description: I have created photographic and cinematic work on subjects like childrights, child domestic workers, child labour, child exploitation and child abuse. I have worked with TDH in Bangladesh, Sudan, Cambodia, Burkina Faso, Peru, Bolivia and Albania. The work has been used to campaign, raise awareness through large media publications, has been broadcasted on TV and on the internet.
profile_positions.title: Photographer, Filmmaker and multimedia

profile_positions.description: I have been working as a photographer with UNICEF for over 15 years covering many situations around war, earthquakes, malnutrition, child rights and other emergencies. The last years I'm also working on the Unicef campaigns as a photographer. Together we produce stories for both print campaigns but also bring back the authentic stories of the children in films. In the Odessa project I have worked as a filmmaker. I made short films about streetchildren in the city of Odessa. My work was producing, filming, editing the stories into short films for the specially made website. But general I work for them as a photographer.
profile_positions.title: Photography and campaigns

profile_positions.description: A dedicated photography masterclass and workshop for the students who follow journalism and mediastudies. During a 4 week period the students where getting lectures, hands-on assignments and guidance to better understand and master the world of visual storytelling.
profile_positions.title: Teacher - Photography mastersclass and workshop at faculty Mediastudies

profile_positions.description: I have been working as a photographer on on different occasions with the VPRO radio. Together we made different multimedia productions and have won the special price in the Prix Italia 2009 with our multimedia production about the crisis in Detroit.
profile_positions.title: photographer & multimedia productions

profile_positions.description: The last years Trouw has been publishing a lot of my work and documentaries. From large publications about the secret societies in West-Africa till the stories from the borders of Turkey, the LRA in North Uganda, the crisis in Darfur but also many stories from the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: photographer & photojournalist

profile_positions.description: Pf magazine is a professional photography magazine in the Netherlands and Belgium. With the magazine we want to inspire, inform and connect photographers and the photo-business. In my role I'm responsible for the editorial content, connection to the business and all the leading brands in the photography industry.
profile_positions.title: Editor-in-chief P/f magazine ( professional photography )

profile_positions.description: content author for P/f magazine. I make camera reviews and write stories about equipment or write about how I work in the field. I write the articles and select themes I think are relevant to the photography business. I also give lectures about my work and way of working on special events.
profile_positions.title: editor Pf magazine (professional photography)
